Sentencas: In the present study, high-quality apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 powders are successfully synthesized by a facile molten-salt synthesis method (MSSM) at low temperatures, using LiCl, LiCl/NaCl mixture (mass ratio 1: 1) as molten salt, respectively.
Titulo: Low-temperature synthesis of apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 as electrolytes with high conductivity

Sentencas: Experimental results indicate that the optimal mass ratio between reactant and molten salt is 1: 2, and LiCl/NaCl mixed molten-salt is more beneficial for forming high-quality La9.33Ge6O26 powders than LiCl individual molten-salt.
Titulo: Low-temperature synthesis of apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 as electrolytes with high conductivity

Sentencas: Comparing with the conventional solid-state reaction method (SSRM), the synthesis temperature of apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 powders using the MSSM decreases more than 350 degrees C, which can effectively avoid Ge loss in the preparation process of precursor powders.
Titulo: Low-temperature synthesis of apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 as electrolytes with high conductivity

Sentencas: Furthermore, the powders obtained by the MSSM are homogeneous, non-agglomerated and well crystallized, which are very favorable for gaining dense pellets in the premise of avoiding Ge loss.
Titulo: Low-temperature synthesis of apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 as electrolytes with high conductivity

Sentencas: On the basis of high-quality precursor powders, the dense and pure ceramic pellets of La9.33Ge6O26 are gained at a low temperature of 1100 degrees C for 2 h, which exhibit higher conductivities (sigma(850) (degrees C(LiCl)) = 2.3 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Low-temperature synthesis of apatite-type La9.33Ge6O26 as electrolytes with high conductivity
